verses.verse: "For, <S%H3117><s%> behold, in those days, and in that time, <S%H6256><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> I restore the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>

I will gather <S%H6908><s%> all nations, <S%H1471><s%> and will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> into the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat; <S%H3092><s%> and I will execute judgment <S%H8199><s%> on them there for my people, <S%H5971><s%> and for my heritage, <S%H5159><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom they have scattered <S%H6340><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%> They have divided <S%H2505><s%> my land, <S%H776><s%>

and have cast <S%H3032><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for my people, <S%H5971><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> a boy <S%H3206><s%> for a prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and sold <S%H4376><s%> a girl <S%H3207><s%> for wine, <S%H3196><s%> that they may drink. <S%H8354><s%>

"Yes, <S%H6865><s%> and what are you to me, Tyre, and Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> and all the regions <S%H1552><s%> of Philistia? <S%H6429><s%> Will <S%H7999><s%> you repay <S%H1580><s%> me? <S%H1580><s%> And if you repay me, <S%H7031><s%> I will swiftly and speedily <S%H4120><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> your repayment <S%H1576><s%> on your own head. <S%H7218><s%>
Because you have taken <S%H3947><s%> my silver <S%H3701><s%> and my gold, <S%H2091><s%> and have carried <S%H935><s%> my finest <S%H2896><s%> treasures <S%H4261><s%> into your temples, <S%H1964><s%>

and have sold <S%H4376><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to the sons of the Greeks, <S%H3125><s%> that you may remove them far <S%H7368><s%> from their border. <S%H1366><s%>

Behold, <S%H5782><s%> I will stir them up out of the place <S%H4725><s%> where you have sold <S%H4376><s%> them, <S%H7725><s%> and will return your repayment <S%H1576><s%> on your own head; <S%H7218><s%>

and I will sell <S%H4376><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and they will sell <S%H4376><s%> them to the men of Sheba, <S%H7615><s%> to a faraway <S%H7350><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken it. <S%H1696><s%>"

Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> this among the nations: <S%H1471><s%> "Prepare <S%H6942><s%> for war! <S%H4421><s%> Stir up <S%H5782><s%> the mighty men. <S%H1368><s%> Let all the <S%H582><s%> warriors <S%H4421><s%> draw near. <S%H5066><s%> Let them come up. <S%H5927><s%>

Beat <S%H3807><s%> your plowshares <S%H855><s%> into swords, <S%H2719><s%> and your pruning hooks <S%H4211><s%> into spears. <S%H7420><s%> Let the weak <S%H2523><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1368><s%> 'I am strong.'

Hurry <S%H5789><s%> and come, <S%H935><s%> all you surrounding nations, <S%H1471><s%> and gather <S%H5439><s%> yourselves together. <S%H6908><s%>" Cause your mighty ones <S%H1368><s%> to come down <S%H5181><s%> there, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.

"Let the nations <S%H1471><s%> arouse <S%H5782><s%> themselves, <S%H5927><s%> and come up to the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jehoshaphat; <S%H3092><s%> for there will I sit <S%H3427><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> all the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Put <S%H7971><s%> in the sickle; <S%H4038><s%> for the harvest <S%H7105><s%> is ripe. <S%H1310><s%> Come, <S%H935><s%> tread, <S%H3381><s%> for the winepress <S%H1660><s%> is full, <S%H4390><s%> the vats <S%H3342><s%> overflow, <S%H7783><s%> for their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is great. <S%H7227><s%>"

Multitudes, <S%H1995><s%> multitudes <S%H1995><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision! <S%H2742><s%> For the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision. <S%H2742><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> are darkened, <S%H6937><s%> and the stars <S%H3556><s%> withdraw <S%H622><s%> their shining. <S%H5051><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will roar <S%H7580><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> will shake; <S%H7493><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be a refuge <S%H4268><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> and a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"So you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> dwelling <S%H7931><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%> Then Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will be holy, <S%H6944><s%> and no strangers <S%H2114><s%> will pass through her any more. <S%H5674><s%>

It will happen in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> will drop down <S%H5197><s%> sweet wine, <S%H6071><s%> the hills <S%H1389><s%> will flow <S%H3212><s%> with milk, <S%H2461><s%> all the brooks <S%H650><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will flow <S%H3212><s%> with waters, <S%H4325><s%> and a fountain <S%H4599><s%> will come forth <S%H3318><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and will water <S%H8248><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Shittim. <S%H7851><s%>

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will be a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and Edom <S%H123><s%> will be a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> for the violence <S%H2555><s%> done to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> because they have shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in their land. <S%H776><s%>
But Judah <S%H3063><s%> will be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
I will cleanse <S%H5352><s%> their blood, <S%H1818><s%> that I have not cleansed: <S%H5352><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> dwells <S%H7931><s%> in Zion. <S%H6726><s%>"
